name: SolidWorks Drawing Sheet
summary: An SLDDRT file is a drawing sheet created by Dassault Systemes SolidWorks, a popular CAD program. It contains dimensions used to load the sheet in SolidWorks, so a user can create an appropriately-sized drawing ( .SLDDRW file). SLDDRT files may also contain logos, guidelines, and fields used to show drawing properties.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: SLDDRT file open in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks Premium 2022
